text: English vocabulary lesson 14 topic
connotations part 2
exercise three let's further test your
knowledge of connotations answer the
questions we'll start with an example
which word below may be considered
old-fashioned the answer is stewardess
today this job is done by women and men
so we use flight attendant question 1
which word below suggests a higher level
of skill and training the answer career
question 2 which word below has a more
negative connotation the answer is
cowardly question 3 which word below is
considered old-fashioned in everyday
speech the answer is automobile in
everyday conversation we talked about
washing owning and driving your car not
your automobile question 4 which word
below can suggest a lack of politeness
the answer is bold for example a bold
question could be considered as a rude
question
question 5 which word below would better
describe the way a person appears in a
painting the answer nude both words mean
not having clothing but nude is used
usually in the context of art question 6
which word is the most neutral in
general of the three the answer alcohol
liquor usually refers to hard drinks
like vodka and whiskey booze is slang
and it also refers to hard liquor
exercise for are you familiar with us
culture answer the questions to the best
of your ability let's start with an
example which restaurant in the u.s. is
probably most associated with hamburgers
well I'd argue that it's McDonald's the
point of this exercise is to demonstrate
that connotations can be cultural so try
your best here's question number one
which US holiday is most associated with
fireworks the answer the fourth of July
so most Americans associate fireworks
with Independence Day question two which
u.s. state is most associated with
potatoes I'd argue that it's Idaho go
into any grocery store in America and
you will see Idaho potatoes for sale
question three which US city is most
associated with gambling and casinos I'd
argue that it's Las Vegas Nevada
question four which US cities are most
likely to be associated with jazz I
think most Americans would agree that
it's New Orleans Chicago and New York
question five which American film
character popularized boxing the one and
only rocky played by Sylvester Stallone
question six where is the center of the
US government the answer Washington DC
our nation's capital
that's all for now thanks for watching
and happy studies
